summary: Adds a new weapon to the game, the daedric armblade. Slightly stonger than a sword but slightly heavier too.
descriptionHtml:
Check out my new mod: Blazerend and Chillrend Redone: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28602

Adds a new weapon to the game, the daedric armblade. Slightly stonger than a sword but slightly heavier too. They are craftable and upgradable at the respective crafting stations. PLEASE NOTE: The weapon will use the nromal daedric textures ( i hope at least :S) The textures shown in the picture are from this mod: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3104

Trying to figure out how to make the weapon look a little less weird when its not drawn. Any advice would be greatly appreciated :S
author: Iodrome
